variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependencies.name: py-pytoml
dependencies.description: A parser for TOML-0.4.0. Deprecated: use py-toml instead.

dependent_to.name: py-packaging
dependent_to.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-myst-parser
dependent_to.description:
A Sphinx and Docutils extension to parse MyST, a rich and extensible
flavour of Markdown for authoring technical and scientific
documentation.

dependent_to.name: py-aiosqlite
dependent_to.description: asyncio bridge to the standard sqlite3 module

dependent_to.name: py-npx
dependent_to.description: Some useful extensions for NumPy

dependent_to.name: py-etils
dependent_to.description: etils (eclectic utils) is an open-source collection of utils for python.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinxcontrib-jquery
dependent_to.description: A sphinx extension which ensure that jQuery is installed with Sphinx.

dependent_to.name: py-tomli-w
dependent_to.description: A lil' TOML writer.

dependent_to.name: py-pyproject-hooks
dependent_to.description: Wrappers to call pyproject.toml-based build backend hooks.

dependent_to.name: py-entrypoints
dependent_to.description: Discover and load entry points from installed packages.

dependent_to.name: py-anndata
dependent_to.description:
anndata is a Python package for handling annotated data matrices in
memory and on disk, positioned between pandas and xarray.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-design
dependent_to.description:
A sphinx extension for designing beautiful, screen-size responsive web
components.

dependent_to.name: py-idna
dependent_to.description: Internationalized Domain Names for Python (IDNA 2008 and UTS #46)

dependent_to.name: py-urllib3-secure-extra
dependent_to.description:
Marker library to detect whether urllib3 was installed with the
deprecated [secure] extra

dependent_to.name: py-tinycss2
dependent_to.description:
tinycss2 is a low-level CSS parser and generator written in Python: it
can parse strings, return objects representing tokens and blocks, and
generate CSS strings corresponding to these objects.

dependent_to.name: py-pep517
dependent_to.description: Wrappers to build Python packages using PEP 517 hooks.

dependent_to.name: py-mdit-py-plugins
dependent_to.description: Collection of core plugins for markdown-it-py

dependent_to.name: py-testpath
dependent_to.description:
Testpath is a collection of utilities for Python code working with files
and commands.

dependent_to.name: py-scanpy
dependent_to.description:
Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression
data built jointly with anndata.

dependent_to.name: py-backcall
dependent_to.description: Specifications for callback functions passed in to an API

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx
dependent_to.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.

dependent_to.name: py-circus
dependent_to.description:
Circus is a program that will let you run and watch multiple processes
and sockets.

dependent_to.name: py-pkgutil-resolve-name
dependent_to.description:
Resolve a name to an object. A backport of Python 3.9
`pkgutil.resolve_name`

dependent_to.name: py-ptyprocess
dependent_to.description: Run a subprocess in a pseudo terminal

dependent_to.name: py-more-itertools
dependent_to.description: Additions to the standard Python itertools package.

dependent_to.name: py-qpsolvers
dependent_to.description:
Unified interface to convex Quadratic Programming (QP) solvers available
in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-jeepney
dependent_to.description: Low-level, pure Python DBus protocol wrapper.

dependent_to.name: py-pyyaml-env-tag
dependent_to.description: A custom YAML tag for referencing environment variables in YAML files.

dependent_to.name: py-seaborn
dependent_to.description:
Seaborn: statistical data visualization. Seaborn is a library for making
attractive and informative statistical graphics in Python. It is built
on top of matplotlib and tightly integrated with the PyData stack,
including support for numpy and pandas data structures and statistical
routines from scipy and statsmodels.

dependent_to.name: py-argon2-cffi
dependent_to.description: The secure Argon2 password hashing algorithm..

dependent_to.name: py-uhi
dependent_to.description:
Unified Histogram Interface: tools to help library authors work with
histograms

dependent_to.name: py-flit
dependent_to.description: Flit is a simple way to put Python packages and modules on PyPI.

dependent_to.name: py-colorio
dependent_to.description: Tools for color research

dependent_to.name: py-aioitertools
dependent_to.description:
Implementation of itertools, builtins, and more for AsyncIO and mixed-
type iterables.

dependent_to.name: py-lazy-loader
dependent_to.description: lazy_loader makes it easy to load subpackages and functions on demand.

dependent_to.name: py-tomli
dependent_to.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependent_to.name: py-build
dependent_to.description: A simple, correct PEP517 package builder.

dependent_to.name: py-typing-extensions
dependent_to.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependent_to.name: py-submitit
dependent_to.description: Python toolbox for submitting jobs to Slurm.

dependent_to.name: py-pathspec
dependent_to.description:
pathspec extends the test loading and running features of unittest,
making it easier to write, find and run tests.

dependent_to.name: py-pyparsing
dependent_to.description: A Python Parsing Module.

dependent_to.name: py-threadpoolctl
dependent_to.description:
Python helpers to limit the number of threads used in the threadpool-
backed of common native libraries used for scientific computing and data
science (e.g. BLAS and OpenMP).

dependent_to.name: py-flit-scm
dependent_to.description:
A PEP 518 build backend that uses setuptools_scm to generate a version
file from your version control system, then flit to build the package.
